sen.j: 中京区（なかぎょうく）は、京都市を構成する11区のうちのひとつ。
sen.e: Nakagyo Ward is one of the eleven wards in Kyoto City.
Nakagyo Ward is one of the eleven wards in Kyoto City.
Nakagyo Ward is one of the eleven wards that constitute Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 近年都心回帰が進み、平成17年国勢調査（2005年）における推計人口が1985年（昭和60年）以来20年ぶりに10万人の大台を回復した。
sen.e: As more people returned to the urban area of Kyoto City in recent years, the estimated population of Nakagyo Ward, according to the national census taken in 2005, exceeded 10 million for the first time in 20 years (since 1985).

As more people returned to the urban areas of Kyoto City in recent years, the estimated population of Nakagyo Ward, according to the national census taken in 2005, exceeded 10 million for the first time in 20 years (since 1985).

As more people returned to the urban areas of Kyoto City in recent years, the estimated population of Nakagyo Ward, according to the national census taken in 2005, exceeded 100,000 for the first time in twenty years (since 1985).

sen.j: 特に南部の明倫学区や本能学区での人口増加が著しい。
sen.e: The Meirin school and Honno school districts in the south of Nakagyo Ward, in particular, have seen rapid population growth.
The Meirin school and Honno school districts in the south of Nakagyo Ward, in particular, have seen rapid population growth.
The Meirin school and Honno school districts in the south of Nakagyo Ward, in particular, have seen rapid population growth.

sen.j: これらの地域は子育てに適した市内有数の文教地区と近年来注目されているエリアである。
sen.e: These districts have attracted attention as a leading educational district in Kyoto City, suitable for raising children.
These districts have attracted attention as a leading educational district in Kyoto City, suitable for raising children.
These districts have attracted attention as a leading educational district in Kyoto City, suitable for raising children.

sen.j: 地元以外からは、愛知県などが属する中京圏と同じように「ちゅうきょう」と読まれたり、「中央区」と誤記されることも多い。
sen.e: Nakagyo Ward (中京区) is often mispronounced by people other than local residents as 'Chukyo' as in the 'Chukyo area' (中京圏), which includes Aichi Prefecture; it is also often misspelled as 'Chuo Ward' (中央区).

Nakagyo Ward (中京区) is often mispronounced by people other than local residents as 'Chukyo' as in the 'Chukyo area' (中京圏), which includes Aichi Prefecture; it is also often misspelled as 'Chuo Ward' (中央区).

Nakagyo Ward (中京区) is often mispronounced by people other than local residents as 'Chukyo' as in the 'Chukyo area' (中京圏), which includes Aichi Prefecture; it is also often misspelled as 'Chuo Ward' (中央区).

sen.j: 河川：鴨川 (淀川水系)、堀川 (京都府)、高瀬川 (京都府)、西高瀬川
sen.e: Rivers: Kamogawa River (Yodo-gawa River System), Hori-kawa River, Takase-gawa River and Nishi-takase-gawa River
Rivers: Kamogawa River (Yodo-gawa River System), Hori-kawa River, Takase-gawa River and Nishi-takase-gawa River
Rivers: Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River System), Hori-kawa River, Takase-gawa River and Nishi-takase-gawa River

sen.j: 1929年4月1日 - 京都市の増区により、旧上京区の南部と旧下京区の北部が中京区となる。
sen.e: On April 1, 1929, with the expansion of districts in Kyoto City, Nakagyo Ward was formed from the south part of the former Kamigyo Ward and the north part of the former Shimogyo Ward.
On April 1, 1929, with the expansion of districts in Kyoto City, Nakagyo Ward was formed from the south part of the former Kamigyo Ward and the north part of the former Shimogyo Ward.
April 1, 1929: With the expansion of districts in Kyoto City, Nakagyo Ward was formed from the south part of the former Kamigyo Ward and the north part of the former Shimogyo Ward.
sen.cmt: "On April 1, 1929, with"→"April 1, 1929: With"に変更しました。

sen.j: 中京区は、旧上京区の丸太町通以南と旧下京区の四条通以北（四条通に面する町は下京区）から分離して成立したものである。
sen.e: The areas to the south of the Marutamachi-dori Street and to the north of the Shijo-dori Street were each separated from the former Kamigyo Ward and the former Shimogyo Ward (which includes towns along the Shijo-dori Street) to create Nakagyo Ward.

The areas to the south of the Marutamachi-dori Street and to the north of the Shijo-dori Street were each separated from the former Kamigyo Ward and the former Shimogyo Ward (which includes towns along the Shijo-dori Street) to create Nakagyo Ward.

The areas to the south of the Marutamachi-dori Street and to the north of the Shijo-dori Street were each separated from the former Kamigyo Ward and the former Shimogyo Ward (which includes towns along the Shijo-dori Street) to create Nakagyo Ward.

sen.j: 夷川通に残る、町名を示す古い住所表示看板に「上京区」（区は旧字体）の表記がある。
sen.e: The name of the town on the boards in the Ebisugawa-dori Street uses the old address 'Kamigyo Ward' ('Ward' being written in the old form of a Chinese character).
The name of the town on the boards in the Ebisugawa-dori Street uses the old address 'Kamigyo Ward' ('Ward' being written in the old form of a Chinese character).
The name of the town on the boards in the Ebisugawa-dori Street uses the old address 'Kamigyo Ward' ('Ward' being written in the old form of a Chinese character).
